EmoteActions.Message: Greetings! I've just come to head the garrison here in Shoushi. The townsfolk of this peaceful city must be protected, and everyone should do their share to help! Could you help me to investigate a certain matter?

There is a farmer who lives a little ways past the Shoushi South Outpost. He's been a normal townsmember for a very long time, but no one can speak for how he's come into so much wealth recently. Normally it's a cause to celebrate when one's neighbor moves up in the world...but why is he acting so distantly when he comes to town to stock up on provisions?
Could you go and check in on him? I am sure there is nothing amiss, but I just want to be sure...

Greetings! I've just come to head the garrison here in Shoushi. The townsfolk of this peaceful city must be protected, and everyone should do their share to help! Could you help me to investigate a certain matter?

There is a farmer who lives a little ways past the Shoushi South Outpost. He's been a normal townsmember for a very long time, but no one can speak for how he's come into so much wealth recently. Normally it's a cause to celebrate when one's neighbor moves up in the world...but why is he acting so distantly when he comes to town to stock up on provisions?
Could you go and check in on him? I am sure there is nothing amiss, but I just want to be sure...
You say you found this Guard's uniform in a hidden room in the farmer's basement? What's more, he had many of them? And he's stockpiling a large armament as well?

How could he have found access to these uniforms? These are the sole property of Her Majesty's Guard--and are dispensed only through our headquarters. They must have been stolen whilst our quartermaster was in his cups...I will alert our Queen of this affair immediately.

I believe Dame Tsaya in Yaraq should be alerted to this affair as well. Please take this letter to her--I have included your recent discoveries. I'm sure she will be highly interested to hear of what you have found.
Thank you for your help--here is your reward.
You say you found this Guard's uniform in a hidden room in the farmer's basement? What's more, he had many of them? And he's stockpiling a large armament as well?

How could he have found access to these uniforms? These are the sole property of Her Majesty's Guard--and are dispensed only through our headquarters. They must have been stolen whilst our quartermaster was in his cups...I will alert our Queen of this affair immediately.

I believe Dame Tsaya in Yaraq should be alerted to this affair as well. Please take this letter to her--I have included your recent discoveries. I'm sure she will be highly interested to hear of what you have found.
Thank you for your help--here is your reward.
Sir Tenshin reads the letter from Sir Rylanan with no small amount of amazement and disgust.

A glass spherule encapulating what looks as if it could be portal space energy? And what's this? Husks made from human skins? Poor Rylanan and Tsaya--they have more to deal with than they signed up for, I'll wager.  Hollow Minions playing around with portal space and harvesting the skin off of people's backs--no good will come of it. Mark my words...

Come to think of it, I've remarked on some suspicious characters lately myself. Perhaps you can help me. There is a farmer who lives a little ways past the Shoushi South Outpost. He's been a normal townsmember for a very long time, but no one can speak for how he's come into so much wealth recently. Normally it's a cause to celebrate when one's neighbor moves up in the world...but why is he acting so distantly when he comes to town to stock up on provisions?
Could you go and check in on him? I am sure there is nothing amiss, but after hearing all of this I have to be sure...
You say you found this note near Holtburg? You should take it to Sir Rylanan. He is overseeing the garrision in Shoushi and will be interested in any local developments.
My instincts were correct. I wonder who his new patron is? Here, you may have this back. I have already committed it to memory.
You say you found this note near Yaraq? You should take it to Dame Tsaya. She is overseeing the garrision in Yaraq and will be interested in any local developments.
You say you found this strange  object near Holtburg? You should take it to Sir Rylanan. He is overseeing the garrison in Holtburg and will be interested in any local developments.
Sir Tenshin takes one look at the object you just handed and turns a delicate shade of green.

I think I'm going to be ill. You say you found this near Yaraq? Quickly, take it to Dame Tsaya. She is overseeing the garrision in Yaraq and will be interested in any local developments. Go now, and take this with you.
Sir Tenshin reads the letter from Sir Rylanan with no small amount of amazement.

A glass spherule encapulating what looks as if it could be portal space energy? For what purpose? They say that Dereth is full of wonders...but if Hollow Minions are playing around with portal space, no good can come of it. Mark my words...

Come to think of it, I've remarked on some suspicious characters lately myself. Perhaps you can help me. There is a farmer who lives a little ways past the Shoushi South Outpost. He's been a normal townsmember for a very long time, but no one can speak for how he's come into so much wealth recently. Normally it's a cause to celebrate when one's neighbor moves up in the world...but why is he acting so distantly when he comes to town to stock up on provisions?
Could you go and check in on him? I am sure there is nothing amiss, but I just want to be sure...
This letter is addressed to Dame Tsaya. You should take it to her in Yaraq.
This letter is addressed to Dame Tsaya. You should take it to her in Yaraq.
This letter is addressed to Sir Rylanan. You should take it to him in Holtburg.
This letter is addressed to Sir Rylanan. You should take it to him in Holtburg.
Sir Tenshin reads the note you found in the Hall of Hollows.

As I suspected--I thought they would try to infiltrate our ranks to gain access to Queen Elysa. But who would have thought they would be so low as to try to murder Borealean, Thorsten Cragstone's own son? The storm gathers once more...but nevermind. Your efforts have not gone unnoticed this day, comrade. Let me bestow upon you a mark of our Queen's favor, in recognition of your service to the crown of New Aluvia.
Sir Tenshin reads the note you found in the Hall of Hollows.

But who would have thought they would be so low as to try to murder Borealean, Thorsten Cragstone's own son? The storm gathers once more...but nevermind. Your efforts have not gone unnoticed this day, comrade. Let me bestow upon you a mark of our Queen's favor, in recognition of your service to the crown of New Aluvia.

Your efforts have not gone unnoticed this day, comrade. Let me bestow upon you a mark of our Queen's favor, in recognition of your service to the crown of New Aluvia.
Sir Tenshin reads the note you found in the Hall of Hollows.

As I suspected--I thought they would try to infiltrate our ranks to gain access to Queen Elysa. But who would have thought they would be so low as to try to murder Borealean, Thorsten Cragstone's own son? The storm gathers once more...but nevermind. Your efforts have not gone unnoticed this day, comrade. Let me bestow upon you a mark of our Queen's favor, in recognition of your service to the crown of New Aluvia.

It is always a pleasure to greet those who have helped the kingdom as you have done. Things seem to have died down a little bit--perhaps if you come back in two weeks or so I'll have more news to impart.
Good to see you again. I am glad  to see that you survived infiltrating Fort Witshire unscathed. Did you find anything of note while you were there?
Oh there you are. Need to go back underneath Fort Witshire? The portal is right there.
Good to see you again! Have you taken my letter to Dame Tsaya yet? I think that she really ought to be informed of your discoveries here.
There you are! Have you found out what that farmer's secret is? Let me know if he's been hoarding anything that could be considered...unusual in his house.
Greetings. Sir Rylanan mentioned he might be sending updates to me from Holtburg every so often. Might he have sent one with you?

Oh hello! I've got my hands full at the moment with a little local problem...perhaps you should visit Sir Rylanan up in Holtburg for now. He's heading up the garrison up there and will probably have a task for you.
Good to see you again! Have you taken my letter to Dame Tsaya yet? I think that she really ought to be informed of your discoveries here.
There you are! Have you found out what that farmer's secret is? Let me know if he's been hoarding anything that could be considered...unusual in his house.

Well, this is interesting! A Guard's uniform, no less! But I must apologize--I must tend to my duties as senior Guard here in Shoushi today. Keep this for now--but be sure to return and remind me of it in the future when I have more time.
You say you found this Guard's uniform in a hidden room in the farmer's basement? What's more, he had many of them? And he's stockpiling a large armament as well?

How could he have found access to these uniforms? These are the sole property of Her Majesty's Guard--and are dispensed only through our headquarters. They must have been stolen whilst our quartermaster was in his cups...I will alert our Queen of this affair immediately.

I believe Dame Tsaya in Yaraq should be alerted to this affair as well. Please take this letter to her--I have included your recent discoveries. I'm sure she will be highly interested to hear of what you have found.
Thank you for your help--here is your reward.
Sir Tenshin reads the letter from Sir Rylanan with no small amount of amazement and disgust.

This is just too much. Farmers stockpiling arsenals in their hidden basements, Hollow Minions torturing hapless victims and removing the very skin from their bodies, filling spherules with portal space energy, I can't take it! Why was I ever promoted?
Sir Tenshin quickly descends into a short flurry of hysteria, hiccups, and pulls himself together.

There must be connection here...could the Hollow Minions be taking the skins from their victims in order to fill them with the portal space in those spherules Rylanan told me about? All to clothe them in our Guards uniforms? This must be a plot to strike down our Queen! Every one knows that our station here is intended only to be temporary--we're only here to restore stability and then return to her. This is terrible...I'm never going home, am I? Alright, pull yourself together, soldier!

We have heard that a group of Hollow Minions have recently claimed Fort Witshire and barricaded themselves inside. Now that I think of it, this must be where their headquarters for this plot are located. It has long been known that Fort Witshire was built upon the ruins of an old Empyrean prison. We have been planning to infiltrate the fort by using the hidden corridors deep beneath the fort--and you seem like just the person to help us with this.   Here is a key that was found among Witshire's effects--it may be useful when you reach the surface to enter the fort.

Use the portal next to me to enter the prison, then find your way to the top to reach the confines of Fort Witshire. Now, hurry! Try to find out what those Minions are plotting! There is no time to waste!
